meanings.definition: Used to draw attention to something.
meanings.sent1: Lookit, there's a rainbow in the sky!
meanings.sent2: Lookit how cute that puppy is!
meanings.sent3: Lookit, the cat is wearing sunglasses!
meanings.sent4: Lookit, the stars are dancing in the night sky!
meanings.sent5: Lookit, the flowers are blooming in the garden!

meanings.definition: A command to look at something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher gave a lookit to the students to pay attention.
meanings.sent2: He used a lookit to point out the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The lookit from the coach made the team focus on the game.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a lookit, guiding him through the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The lookit of the lighthouse led the ships safely to shore.
